  • Kernel operations and the Web UI
  • View page source

Kernel operations and the Web UI¶

There is an API that allows an application developer to run operations in the way the Windows client does. This means you get a form generated from the Mask configuration where you can enter your data and run the operation by pressing the button. At this time there are many restrictions using this approach compared to the behaviour of the Windows client. Because of these restrictions there is a separate configuration if an operation can be used this way with the Web UI.
